languages.text:
Этот персонаж использует рукопашное оружие — чтобы атаковать в ближнем бою, он должен находиться на соседней с врагом клетке. Чтобы совершить атаку, кликните [ЛКМ] на способности Удар, а затем на противнике, которого хотите атаковать. В отличие от одиночного выстрела, атака в рукопашном бою попадает по противнику автоматически, без броска на попадание. Противник попытается уклониться и парировать атаку, если также использует рукопашное оружие.
Рукопашным оружием можно совершить {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} — все существа в зоне ее действия получат урон, если не пройдут проверку {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g}, если они также используют рукопашное оружие. Урон от атаки рукопашным оружием зависит от параметров оружия и показателя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} атакующего.

This character is using a melee weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, click [LMB] on the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, then on the enemy you wish to attack. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g}, melee attacks hit automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer damage unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.
languages.original_text:
Этот персонаж использует рукопашное оружие — чтобы атаковать в ближнем бою, он должен находиться на соседней с врагом клетке. Чтобы совершить атаку, кликните [ЛКМ] на способности Удар, а затем на противнике, которого хотите атаковать. В отличие от одиночного выстрела, атака в рукопашном бою попадает по противнику автоматически, без броска на попадание. Противник попытается уклониться и парировать атаку, если также использует рукопашное оружие.
Рукопашным оружием можно совершить {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по области{/g} — все существа в зоне ее действия получат урон, если не пройдут проверку {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирования{/g}, если они также используют рукопашное оружие. Урон от атаки рукопашным оружием зависит от параметров оружия и показателя {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силы{/g} атакующего.

traits.locale_text: This character is using a melee weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, click [LMB] on the strike {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, then on the enemy you wish to attack. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. However, the enemy can still {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} the attack, and they can also {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it if they are using a melee weapon of their own. Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer damage unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

You can also make an area attack with melee weapon — it will hit all creatures that are in its area of ​​effect. A character in range of an area attack will try to avoid it and automatically make a {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Dodge{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parry{/g} checks. The {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of an area attack made by a melee weapon depends on the parameters of the weapon and the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} characteristic.

This character is using a melee weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, click [LMB] on the strike {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, then on the enemy you wish to attack. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g}, melee attacks {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hit{/g} automatically with no need for a roll. However, the enemy can still {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} the attack, and they can also {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} it if they are using a melee weapon of their own. Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer damage unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

languages.text:
此角色正在使用近战武器，{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}只能攻击邻近的敌人。若要进行近战攻击，按下鼠标左键选择{g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}打击{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，之后点击需要攻击的敌人。近战攻击与{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}不同，它会默认命中敌人，无需掷骰。目标敌人会尝试{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}此次攻击，如果该敌人同样手持近战武器，则会尝试使用武器{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击。
近战武器可以发动{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，影响范围内的所有生物都需要进行闪避{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}（如果受影响的生物使用的是近战武器，还可以进行招架检定），所有检定失败的生物都会受到伤害。近战武器造成的伤害，取决于武器本身的属性与攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}属性。
languages.original_text:
This character is using a melee weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, click [LMB] on the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, then on the enemy you wish to attack. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g}, melee attacks hit automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer damage unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

traits.locale_text: 此角色正在使用近战武器，{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}只能攻击邻近的敌人。若要进行近战攻击，按下鼠标左键选择打击{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，之后点击需要攻击的敌人。近战攻击与{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}单发射击{/g}不同，它会默认命中敌人，无需掷骰。目标敌人会尝试{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}此次攻击，如果该敌人同样手持近战武器，则会尝试使用武器{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击。 近战武器可以发动{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}，影响范围内的所有生物都需要进行闪避{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}（如果受影响的生物使用的是近战武器，还可以进行招架检定），所有检定失败的生物都会受到伤害。近战武器造成的伤害，取决于武器本身的属性与攻击者的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}属性。

languages.text: このキャラクターは近接武器を使用している。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}を実行するには、キャラクターが敵に隣接している必要がある。近接攻撃を実行するには、攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の上で[LMB]をクリックして、次に攻撃したい敵を選択する。{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}とは異なり、近接攻撃は判定なしに自動的に命中する。ただし敵はその攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}することができ、近接武器を持っていた場合は{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}こともできる。. 近接武器は{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}に使用できる。範囲内のすべての生物は、回避{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}（または近接武器を装備している場合は受け流し判定）に成功しない限りダメージを受ける。近接武器によるダメージは、武器のパラメータと攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}によって異なる。
languages.original_text: This character is using a melee weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, click [LMB] on the strike {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, then on the enemy you wish to attack. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g}, melee attacks hit automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own. Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer damage unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

traits.locale_text: このキャラクターは近接武器を装備している。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}を実行するには、キャラクターが敵に隣接している必要がある。近接攻撃を行うには、攻撃{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}の上で [LMB]、次に攻撃を行う敵の [LMB] をクリックする。{g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}単発射撃{/g}とは異なり、近接攻撃はロールなしに自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}する。ただし、敵はその攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}することができ、近接武器を使っていた場合は{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}こともできる。 近接武器は{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}に使用できる。範囲内のすべての生物は、回避{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}（または近接武器を装備している場合は受け流し判定）に合格しない限り、ダメージを受ける。近接武器が与えるダメージは、武器のパラメータと攻撃者の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}スコアによって変化する。

languages.text:
Este personaje utiliza un arma cuerpo a cuerpo. Los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} precisan que el personaje se sitúe al lado del enemigo. Para realizar un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Golpe{/g}, y luego sobre el enemigo que quieras atacar. A diferencia de los {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataques de un solo disparo{/g}, los de cuerpo a cuerpo impactan automáticamente sin necesidad de superar una prueba. Sin embargo, el enemigo intentará {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquivar{/g} el ataque, o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pararlo{/g} si lleva su propia arma cuerpo a cuerpo.
Las armas cuerpo a cuerpo también pueden lanzar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}. Con esta clase de ataques, todos los seres que se encuentren dentro del área sufrirán daño a menos que superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de esquiva (o una prueba de parada si llevan un arma cuerpo a cuerpo). El daño que ejercen las armas cuerpo a cuerpo viene dado por los parámetros del arma y la puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} del atacante.
languages.original_text:
This character is using a melee weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, click [LMB] on the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, then on the enemy you wish to attack. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g}, melee attacks hit automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer damage unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

traits.locale_text: Este personaje utiliza un arma cuerpo a cuerpo. Los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} precisan que el personaje se sitúe al lado del enemigo. Para realizar un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo, pulsa el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de golpe, y luego sobre el enemigo que quieras atacar. A diferencia de los {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}ataques de un solo disparo{/g}, los de cuerpo a cuerpo {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}impactan{/g} automáticamente sin necesidad de superar una prueba. Sin embargo, el enemigo siempre podrá {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquivar{/g} el ataque e, incluso, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pararlo{/g} si lleva su propia arma cuerpo a cuerpo. Las armas cuerpo a cuerpo también pueden lanzar {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g}. Con esta clase de ataques, todos los seres que se encuentren dentro del área sufrirán daño a menos que superen una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de esquiva (o una prueba de parada si llevan un arma cuerpo a cuerpo). El daño que ejercen las armas cuerpo a cuerpo viene dado por los parámetros del arma y la puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} del atacante.

languages.text:
Dieser Charakter benutzt eine Nahkampfwaffe. Für einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} muss sich der Charakter in der Nähe des Gegners befinden. Klicke für einen Nahkampfangriff mit [LMB] auf die {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Schlagen{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} und dann auf den Gegner, den du attackieren willst. Im Gegensatz zu {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschüssen{/g} treffen Nahkampfangriffe automatisch, ohne dass du dafür würfeln musst. Der Feind versucht, dem Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweichen{/g} und zu {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, wenn er selbst eine Nahkampfwaffe benutzt.
Nahkampfwaffen können für {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} verwendet werden – alle Kreaturen im Wirkungsbereich erleiden Schaden, es sei denn, sie schaffen eine Ausweichen-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} (oder eine Parieren-Probe, wenn sie mit einer Nahkampfwaffe bewaffnet sind). Der von Nahkampfwaffen verursachte Schaden hängt von den Parametern der Waffe und der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} des Angreifers ab.
languages.original_text:
This character is using a melee weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, click [LMB] on the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, then on the enemy you wish to attack. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g}, melee attacks hit automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer damage unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Charakter benutzt eine Nahkampfwaffe. Für einen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriff{/g} muss sich der Charakter in der Nähe des Gegners befinden. Zum Ausführen eines Nahkampfangriffs klickst du mit der [LMB] auf die Schlag-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} und dann auf den Gegner, den du angreifen willst. Im Gegensatz zu {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}Einzelschüssen{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g} Nahkampfangriffe automatisch, ohne dass du dafür würfeln musst. Der Gegner kann dem Angriff trotzdem {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}ausweichen{/g} und ihn auch {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parieren{/g}, wenn er selbst eine Nahkampfwaffe benutzt. Nahkampfwaffen können für {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} verwendet werden — alle Kreaturen in dem Gebiet erleiden Schaden, es sei denn, sie schaffen eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Ausweichprobe{/g} (oder eine Parierprobe, wenn sie mit einer Nahkampfwaffe bewaffnet sind). Der von Nahkampfwaffen verursachte Schaden hängt von den Parametern der Waffe und der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} des Angreifers ab.

languages.text:
Ce personnage utilise une arme de mêlée. Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} impliquent que le personnage soit adjacent à l'ennemi. Pour lancer une attaque de mêlée, cliquez avec le [BGS] sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Frappe{/g}, puis sur l'ennemi que vous souhaitez attaquer. Contrairement aux {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}attaques au coup par coup{/g}, les attaques de mêlée infligent des coups automatiquement, sans qu'il soit nécessaire d'effectuer un jet de dés. L'ennemi tentera d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiver{/g} l'attaque et de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} s'il utilise une arme de mêlée.
Les armes de mêlée peuvent être utilisées pour lancer des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} ; toutes les créatures de la zone subissent des dégâts à moins de réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'esquive (ou un test de parade si elles sont équipées d'une arme de mêlée). Les dégâts infligés par les armes de mêlée dépendent de leurs paramètres et du score de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de l'attaquant.
languages.original_text:
This character is using a melee weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, click [LMB] on the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, then on the enemy you wish to attack. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g}, melee attacks hit automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer damage unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.

traits.locale_text: Ce personnage utilise une arme de mêlée. Les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} impliquent que le personnage soit adjacent à l'ennemi. Pour lancer une attaque de mêlée, cliquez avec le [BGS] sur la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} Frappe, puis sur l'ennemi que vous souhaitez attaquer. Contrairement aux {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}attaques au coup par coup{/g}, les attaques de mêlée infligent des coups automatiquement, sans qu'il soit nécessaire d'effectuer un jet de dés. L'ennemi tentera d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiver{/g} l'attaque et de la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} s'il utilise une arme de mêlée. Les armes de mêlée peuvent être utilisées pour lancer des {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} ; toutes les créatures de la zone subissent des dégâts à moins de réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} d'esquive (ou un test de parade si elles sont équipées d'une arme de mêlée). Les dégâts infligés par les armes de mêlée dépendent de leurs paramètres et du score de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de l'attaquant.

languages.text:
Bu karakter, yakın dövüş silahı kullanıyor. Karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} yapabilmesi için düşmana bitişik hücrede olması gerekir. Yakın dövüş saldırısı yapmak için önce {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}atak{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetine{/g}, sonra da saldırmak istediğin düşmana sol fare tuşuyla tıkla. Yakın dövüş saldırıları, {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}tek atışların{/g} aksine zar atmaya gerek olmaksızın otomatik olarak vurur. Düşman da yakın dövüş silahı kullanıyorsa saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınmaya{/g} veya saldırıyı {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturmaya{/g} çalışacaktır.
Yakın dövüş silahları, {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırıları{/g} yapmak için kullanılabilir. Alandaki tüm yaratıklar, kaçınma {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} (veya yakın dövüş silahı kullanıyorlarsa savuşturma testine) girer ve başarısız olurlarsa hasara maruz kalırlar. Yakın dövüş silahlarının verdiği hasar düzeyi, silahın parametrelerine ve saldırganın {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} değerine bağlıdır.
languages.original_text:
This character is using a melee weapon. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Melee attacks{/g} require the character to be adjacent to the enemy. To make a melee attack, click [LMB] on the {g|f:be721a48e3614ddbb86bf18503511c2c}Strike{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}, then on the enemy you wish to attack. Unlike {g|Encyclopedia:SingleRangedAttacks}single shots{/g}, melee attacks hit automatically with no need for a roll. The enemy will try to {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} the attack if they are using a melee weapon of their own.
Melee weapons can be used to make {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g} — all creatures in the area will suffer damage unless they succeed on a dodge {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} (or a parry test if they are armed with a melee weapon). Damage dealt by melee weapons depends on the weapon's parameters and the attacker's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} score.
